column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I had lunch here one day - got the chicken torta sandwich
column3: but not worth what I paid for. Since I last came
column4: they added new lunch items in their menu so I'm looking forward to trying those! Yes
column5: I know this cafe is pricy
column7: I don't mind paying $$$ for their pastries because it's definitely worth it.
